targets.query:
from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "strategy_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "win_rate")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "positions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quantity")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "signals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> count()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.approved) / (float(v: r.approved) + float(v: r.rejected)) * 100.0 }))

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trade_details")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "signals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "signals")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "positions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "unrealized_pnl")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trailing_sl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_sl" or r["_field"] == "highest_price")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "order_execution")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "slippage_pct")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "order_execution")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)

panels.title: ðŸ“Š Technical Indicators at Trade Time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator_type"] == "rsi" or r["indicator_type"] =~ /rsi/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator_type"] =~ /ema/ or r["indicator_type"] =~ /sma/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indicators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["indicator_type"] =~ /atr/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "positions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quantity")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "positions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quantity")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["strategy_id"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> cumulativeSum()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value, action: r.action }))

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> group(columns: ["strategy_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "strategy_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "win_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Win Rate by Strategy Over Time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "trading")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trades")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pnl")
  |> group(columns: ["strategy_id", "symbol"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "trading",
  tag: "strategy_id",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -24h
)
list.label: Strategy
list.name: strategy
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "trading",
  tag: "strategy_id",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -24h
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "trading",
  tag: "symbol",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -24h
)
list.label: Symbol
list.name: symbol
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "trading",
  tag: "symbol",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -24h
)
